name: EGO
description:
Finally, nowhere, there is absolutely nobody except me. Only with me, space to move and think. Let it be sprawling, inspiring but nothing more...

EGO is an atmospheric first person walking simulator. Dive into an abstract world and explore many derelict and abstract structures.

Sense the gloomy worlds veiled in mysterious fog and walk your paths through many structures.

Experience an alien ambient soundtrack while exploring, filled with dark harmonics and tones.
